about.title: About JirehFaith
about.p1: At Jireh Faith, we believe that when life speaks — in joy, in sorrow, in fear, or in gratitude — the most powerful response comes from God’s Word.
about.p2: Rooted in the promise of Jehovah Jireh — “The Lord will provide” (Genesis 22:14) — JirehFaith is a prayer companion designed to bring Scripture into your everyday circumstances.
about.mission.p: To provide personalized, Scripture-based prayers that meet people where they are, offering comfort, encouragement, and hope — pointing back to God’s faithfulness.
about.how.1: Share Your Need: Select or describe your circumstance.
about.how.2: Scripture Speaks: JirehFaith finds Bible passages reflecting your situation.
about.how.3: Prayer is Formed: A heartfelt prayer is generated, rooted in the Word.
about.unique.1: Scripture First — every prayer anchored in the Bible.
about.unique.2: Emotionally Attuned — powered by DHLL for human sensitivity.
about.unique.4: Accessible for All — free daily prayers; subscriptions and donations sustain the mission.
about.vision.p: We envision a world where no believer prays alone.
about.ministry.p: Please support our ministry through Donation or Subscription. Share the Scriptures with others!
about.blessing: God’s Blessings be upon you always!
